channel.title: CVE Feed for Saturday Drive -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Saturday Drive -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-29220|2024-04-11T02:29:10.868Z -- Saturday Drive -- Ninja Forms
item.description: Ninja Forms prior to 3.8.1 contains a cross-site scripting vulnerability in custom fields for labels. If this vulnerability is exploited, an arbitrary script may be executed on the web browser of the user who is accessing to the website using the product.

item.title: CVE-2024-26019|2024-04-11T02:29:26.514Z -- Saturday Drive -- Ninja Forms
item.description: Ninja Forms prior to 3.8.1 contains a cross-site scripting vulnerability in submit processing. If this vulnerability is exploited, an arbitrary script may be executed on the web browser of the user who is accessing to the website using the product.

item.title: CVE-2024-25572|2024-04-11T02:29:38.560Z -- Saturday Drive -- Ninja Forms
item.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability exists in Ninja Forms prior to 3.4.31. If a website administrator views a malicious page while logging in, unintended operations may be performed.
